title: Start with Kubernetes
description: Get started using Kubernetes. Learn the kubernetes concepts by doing.

scenarios.title: Exploring Kubernetes Deployments
scenarios.description: Learn the basics of 'Deployments' in Kubernetes.

scenarios.title: Creating a Kubernetes Deployment
scenarios.description: Learn how to create a deployment in a kubernetes cluster.

scenarios.title: Communication among different containers in a Pod
scenarios.description: Explore the communication flow among containers in a pod.

scenarios.title: How to run multiple containers in a Pod
scenarios.description: Lets learn deploying multiple containers in a single pod.

scenarios.title: Formatting Kubectl Output
scenarios.description: Lets learn about formatting the output by different Kubectl commands.

scenarios.title: Init containers
scenarios.description: Learn the basics of Init Containers and how these work.
